ibis.compile.util

Class RunJavac

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.compile.util.RunJavac

  • public class RunJavac
extends java.lang.Object
    This class exports a method to run the java compiler on a specified class.

    • Constructor Summary

      RunJavac()

      • setCompiler

        public static void setCompiler(java.lang.String[] c)
        Sets the compiler.
        Parameters:
        c - compiler name plus options

      • runJavac

        public static boolean runJavac(java.lang.String[] compilerArgs,
                               boolean verbose)
        Runs the Java compiler with the specified options on the specified class.
        Parameters:
        compilerArgs - the compiler arguments
        verbose - if true, prints the compilation command on standard output
        Returns:
        true if the exit status of the compiler is 0, false otherwise.
